Class AIPlayer

java.lang.Object
ch.zhaw.theluckyseven.frantic.controller.PlayController
ch.zhaw.theluckyseven.frantic.controller.AIPlayer
public class AIPlayer
extends PlayController
AIPlayer represents a computerplayer used in Singleplayer AIPlayer is a computer controlled player
